title: Gift Box Crystal Roll On, Candle & Essential Oils — Moana Skin
description: The box consists of: - 1 x Lorecurio Crystal Diffuser Roll On - 1 x Moana Winter Charm Candle - 2 x Moana 10ml Essential Oils - 1 x Gift card (blank) - 1 x Gift box LORECURIO Crystal Diffuser Roll On These hand-held rollers are 100% natural crystals, you can put in your own essentia
cleaned_text: Gift Box Crystal Roll On, Candle & Essential Oils Gift Box Crystal Roll On, Candle & Essential Oils The box consists of: - 1 x Lorecurio Crystal Diffuser Roll On - 1 x Moana Winter Charm Candle - 2 x Moana 10ml Essential Oils - 1 x Gift card (blank) - 1 x Gift box LORECURIO Crystal Diffuser Roll On These hand-held rollers are 100% natural crystals, you can put in your own essential oil blend and its natural porous surface will diffuse the oils into the air! Set it on your desk or in your bag and let your favorite oil and crystal duo atomize your intentions. These are also rollers, so remove the lid and you will find a crystal ball tip to roll your blend onto your skin. Available in Rose Quartz, Clear Quartz, Smoky Quartz, Green Fluorite, and Rainbow Fluorite (Randomly chosen if not requested) These crystals have been sterilized, blessed with sage, cleansed with sacred water from an Ubud waterfall, and charged under the Full Moon MOANA Winter Charm Candle The candle is made from 100% vegan organic soy wax and a blend of pure essential oils. Blend: Sweet Orange, Cinnamon, Pine Needle Herbs: Orange Blend 250ml in Glass Amber Jar Burntime: 50-60 hours MOANA Essential Oils Moana essential oils are 100% pure therapeutic-grade oils and offer calming and soothing properties - for the body, mind, and the environment around you. Available in Lavender, Lemon, Lemongrass, Peppermint, Sweet Orange (Randomly chosen if not requested)
